Venues

  • IMU Main Lounge

    The Main Lounge is the perfect location for your wedding ceremony or reception of any size. Continue reading...

  • IMU Second Floor Ballroom

    The spacious Second Floor Ballroom in the University of Iowa's Iowa Memorial Union with its gorgeous woodwork and stunning stage is a beautiful spot for your wedding reception or ceremony. Continue reading...

  • Danforth Chapel at IMU

    This charming 1950's non-denominational chapel adjacent to the Iowa Memorial Union and the beautiful Iowa River is perfect for an intimate wedding ceremony. Continue reading...

  • Hubbard Park

    Located on the corner of Madison St and Iowa Ave, Hubbard Park is a beautiful green space nestled right next to the Iowa River. Continue reading...

  • IMU North River Terrace

    New in 2015, the North River Terrace at the Iowa Memorial Union is a beautiful 6,000 square foot space overlooking the Iowa River and IMU Amphitheater.  Continue reading...

  • The University Club

    The University Club, long known for its excellent catering, offers an elegantly appointed light-filled ballroom, attentive staff, and complimentary convenient parking. Continue reading...

  • Old Capitol

    The sweeping staircases and stately elegance of the historic Old Capitol is the ideal backdrop for a picture-perfect wedding. Continue reading...

  • Carver Hawkeye Arena

    The Feller Club Room, located inside of Carver Hawkeye Arena, is an ideal spot for wedding receptions. Continue reading...

  • Kinnick Stadium Press Box

    Inside the Kinnick Stadium Press Box, state-of-the-art amenities meet the tradition and ambiance of Kinnick Stadium, creating a first-class atmosphere for your wedding. Continue reading...

The Division of Student Life fosters student success by creating and promoting inclusive educationally purposeful services and activities within and beyond the classroom.

For questions about this website, write to imu-web@uiowa.edu

For questions about a specific venue, please contact the person listed on the venue's page.
